song.title: Here for You
song.lyrics:
[1] . G Let our praise be Your welcome . Let our songs be a sign . Cmaj7 G We are here for You, we are here for You . G Let Your breath come from heaven . Fill our hearts with Your life . Cmaj7 G We are here for You, we are here for You
[C] . C To You our hearts are open .D Nothing here is hidden .G/B C You are our one desire .Am7 You alone are holy .D/F# Only You are worthy .G/B C God, let Your fire fall down --- [2] . G Let our shout be Your anthem . Your renown fill the skies . Cmaj7 G We are here for You, we are here for You . G Let Your Word move in power . Let what's dead come to life . Cmaj7 G We are here for You, we are here for You
[B1] . G Gsus2 We welcome You with praise . G Gsus2 We welcome You with praise . Em7 Almighty God of love, . C Be welcomed in this place
[B2] . G Gsus2 Let every heart adore . G Gsus2 Let every soul awake .Em7 Almighty God of love . C G Be welcomed in this place
